text: If I would open a business, I might take some subject about something that I'm into it, something that I admire and have some passion. As training a person by my own, I would like to open personal trainer AI that could fit into measurement of the movement or even optimize the techniques. It can even accelerate the process how to make a program that can fit into my goal, target, weight I could fit also my friends into it and make some comparison and to make some motivation about us to be shared and it can be even socialized like people could see the others videos if it's like public and they can see some other sources and some inspiration it's a very thing that's every who is training want and needs and it can be even automate and integration with other tools it could fit like a huge business tool that's who is not into technology would like to use as a friendly user so it can be a game changer and a very profit tool without any such a financial risk of costing some money

traits.details: The text demonstrates a high level of imagination as the speaker seamlessly weaves together creative ideas for a business venture. The use of vivid language, such as 'personal trainer AI' and 'optimize the techniques', showcases the speaker's ability to think outside the box and conceptualize innovative solutions. The speaker's enthusiasm and passion for the idea are palpable, as they envision a product that can be 'a game changer' and 'very profitable' with minimal financial risk. The language used is futuristic and forward-thinking, with a focus on 'automation' and 'integration with other tools', highlighting the speaker's imaginative and inventive mindset.
